itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Melville "Mel" De Lloyd (2 April 1917 – May 1985) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s, 1940s and 1950s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Resolven RFC and Llanelli RFC, and representative level rugby league (RL) for Wales, and at club level for Warrington (Heritage № 416), Wakefield Trinity (Heritage № 482), and Keighley, as a stand-off, i.e. number 6,
